api

Interface PSPort

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PSPortSocket, PSPortSSL, PSPortTCP

    public interface PSPort
    Interface of the utils of the Middleware API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTopicListener(TopicListener listener)
      This adds a listener so that it is notified of received publications.
      void disconnect()
      This method should disconnect from the server when the API is connected.
      java.lang.String[] getAvailableTopics()
      This method returns an array containing the topics which may contain data.
      MessagePublication getLastSample(java.lang.String topic)
      This method returns the last message of a concrete topic.
      void publish(MessagePublish publication)
      This method should get the topic and the data of the topic to publish it on the server.
      void removeTopicListener(TopicListener listener)
      This method removes a listener so that it no longer receives notifications.
      void subscribe(java.lang.String... topics)
      This method should get a array of the topics to subscribe to the server.
      void unsubscribe(java.lang.String... topics)
      This method should get a array of the topics to unsubscribe to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        This method should disconnect from the server when the API is connected.

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(java.lang.String... topics)
        This method should get a array of the topics to subscribe to the server. First, the method sends a request to the server to subscribe to the topics. Then, the server sends the last message of that topics.
        Parameters:
        topics -

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(java.lang.String... topics)
        This method should get a array of the topics to unsubscribe to the server. It sends unsubscribe messages to the server, one for each topic.
        Parameters:
        topics -

      • publish

        void publish(MessagePublish publication)
        This method should get the topic and the data of the topic to publish it on the server.
        Parameters:
        topic -
        data -

      • getLastSample

        MessagePublication getLastSample(java.lang.String topic)
        This method returns the last message of a concrete topic.
        Parameters:
        topic -
        Returns:
        MessagePublication

      • addTopicListener

        void addTopicListener(TopicListener listener)
        This adds a listener so that it is notified of received publications.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • removeTopicListener

        void removeTopicListener(TopicListener listener)
        This method removes a listener so that it no longer receives notifications.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • getAvailableTopics

        java.lang.String[] getAvailableTopics()
        This method returns an array containing the topics which may contain data.
        Returns:
        The list of topics that contain data.
